text: Niranjan Bhagat (18 April 1926 - 1 February 2018) was an Indian poet and commentator. He was born in Ahmedabad, India. Bhagat won the 1999 Sahitya Akademi Award for Gujarati language for his work Gujarati Sahiyta-Purvardha Uttarardha. He was also an English poet, and had written over a hundred poems in English, most being written in the style of Gitanjali. Bhagat died of a stroke on 1 February 2018 in Ahmedabad at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:20th-century Indian poets Category:Indian critics
title: Niranjan Bhagat
